content.description:
Green - The River V6 Start seated using crimps at the centre of the boulder. Make a move out right to a ledge and then up the centre of the boulder using a bad side pull crimp - very technical. FA Alex Stewart Red - Salmon Belly V4 Start standing left hand under cling, right hand Arete and slap your way up. FA Alex Stewart Blue - The Stream V5 Start as for The River but after you hit the first move exit to the lip jugs to the right. Also very tricky. FA Alex Stewart The boulder is up the hill and to the right of the chamber. To the right of the giver onions boulder if you are looking at the cliffs
go up the trail between the pillar and the chamber pads

Red - Salmon Belly V4 Start standing left hand under cling, right hand Arete and slap your way up. FA Alex Stewart Green - The River V6 Start seated using crimps at the centre of the boulder. Make a move out right to a ledge and then up the centre of the boulder using a bad side pull crimp - very technical. FA Alex Stewart Blue - The Stream V5 Start as for The River but after you hit the first move exit to the lip jugs to the right. Also very tricky. FA Alex Stewart The boulder is up the hill and to the right of the chamber. To the right of the giver onions boulder if you are looking at the cliffs.
Go up the trail between the pillar and the chamber. pads

Blue - The Stream V5 Start as for The River but after you hit the first move exit to the lip jugs to the right. Also very tricky. SDS is V5. Starting from the rail is V4. FA Alex Stewart
​The Stream - beta video​​​

Red - Salmon Belly V4 Start standing left hand under cling, right hand Arete and slap your way up. FA Alex Stewart

Green - The River V6 Start seated using crimps at the centre of the boulder. Make a move out right to a ledge and then up the centre of the boulder using a bad side pull crimp - very technical. FA Alex Stewart

The boulder is up the hill and to the right of the chamber. To the right of the giver onions boulder if you are looking at the cliffs
